references.paper_title: Machine translation aided bilingual data-to-text generation and semantic parsing
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for text graph generation that uses machine translation to improve the quality of generated text, which is highly relevant to the current paper's topic and methods.

references.paper_title: Knowledge graph based synthetic corpus generation for knowledge-enhanced language model pre-training
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for pre-training language models using knowledge graphs which is directly applicable to the proposed approach in the current paper.

references.paper_title: The 2020 bilingual, bi-directional WebNLG+ shared task: Overview and evaluation results (WebNLG+ 2020)
references.reason: This paper describes the WebNLG 2020 shared task, which is used as one of the evaluation datasets for the proposed method in the current paper, making it a crucial reference.

references.paper_title: KGPT: Knowledge-grounded pre-training for data-to-text generation
references.reason: This paper proposes a knowledge-grounded pre-training method for data-to-text generation which is relevant to the proposed approach of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Pure transformers are powerful graph learners
references.reason: This paper demonstrates that transformers can be effectively used for graph learning, which supports the claim made in the current paper that transformers can be used to unify graph and text processing.
